description: The face of an analog clock displaying the time as three o’clock.
apple_vendor_description: Depicted with Apple's characteristic smooth gradients and crisp, clear design, the three o'clock emoji on Apple devices shows a simplified clock face with a bold, easy-to-read hour hand pointing precisely to the '3'. The glossy finish and subtle highlights give it a polished, tactile feel, embodying Appleâ€™s commitment to intuitive visual communication. This emoji is frequently used on Apple devices to indicate a specific time, schedule an appointment, or reference a point in the day.
